title: Apple bran muffins
ingredients: ['50g (2 oz) bran flakes cereal', '160g (5.5 oz) plain flour', '55g (2 oz) soft dark brown sugar', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 tablespoon baking powder', '285ml (10 fl oz) apple juice', '55g (2 oz) butter, melted', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 apple - peeled, cored and chopped']
